title: Python library with Matlab-like functions for creating JavaScript plots

content: readme.md creating javascript plots python is library provides access matlab- functions easily creating javascript plots within python. need deal html, javascript, css get plots multiple linestyles, colors, markers, labels. currently supported javascript plotting libraries are flot nvd3 ( is wrapper around d3). use case this library is have python scripts running automatically updating websites serve javascript plots visitors. example, used library create update plots prespredict.com. during presidential election seasons, cron job calls plotting script daily, automatically updates plots the website data the latest polls. currently supported plotting functions are:figure, clf, plot, title, xlabel, ylabel, grid, hold, legend, close functions are be used output_to_flot, output_to_nvd3, output_to_matplotlib order visualize plots. library works the matlab_utils_for_python library also provides access several matlab- functions syntax, such :matlab- arrays, allow 1-based
